thread.title: Exclusive ‘Sorcerers’ Card Available to Mickey’s Not-So-Scary Halloween Party Guests
thread.title_full: Exclusive ‘Sorcerers’ Card Available to Mickey’s Not-So-Scary Halloween Party Guests

author: Off to Neverland Travel
title: Exclusive ‘Sorcerers’ Card Available to Mickey’s Not-So-Scary Halloween Party Guests
text:
Request a Quote Exclusive ‘Sorcerers’ Card Available to Mickey’s Not-So-Scary Halloween Party Guests 
Attending one of the Mickey’s Not-So-Scary Halloween Parties this fall? Don’t forget to pick up your event-exclusive Sorcerers of the Magic Kingdom game card! 
For the past three years, party guests were treated to a special card – “Chip ‘N’ Dale’s Bag of Tricks” in 2012, a Hitchhiking Ghosts card from the Haunted Mansion® attraction in 2013, and the Helmsman pirate from the Pirates of the Caribbean® attraction in 2014! This year’s card will be called “Minnie Mouse’s Costume Chaos” and will feature Minnie, Clarabelle Cow and Daisy Duck dressed as witches. 
Obtaining your card is easy. Simply visit the Sorcerers of the Magic Kingdom recruitment center inside the Magic Kingdom® Firehouse on Main Street, U.S.A.® . After registering with the Cast Member using your party ticket and wristband, you will receive this year’s special card along with a regular card pack if needed. Supplies are limited for each party, so make sure to visit the recruitment station early in the evening! 
Not familiar with Sorcerers of the Magic Kingdom game? Click here to view our previous article that explains the interactive experience that launched back in 2012.
